评论概述: Great looking, comfortable fit, great option for the price point
评论详情: As I've been updating my summer wardrobe, I have been looking for a variety of short sleeve shirts that can straddle the line between casual and dressy. I had previously picked up another shirt from Coofandy that I really liked. So when given the chance to try out this one, I had no problems giving it a whirl, and it has met my expectations.  While it is polyester, the fabric looks and feels more like a linen shirt. It fits fantastically, even for someone with wide shoulders like I have. I am not thin but I also don't have much of a gut. But I imagine even if you have a bit of a gut, this shirt will still fit very comfortably.  It is a great look for being on the beach in shorts or at the clubhouse in pants. I really like the color too as it is not too flashy but gives just enough color as to be noticed. And the material also feels very durable. Having washed and worn it a couple of times now, I'm happy to report that it is still looking as good as day one.  If you're looking for a great looking, comfortable, versatile button-down shirt, this is a great option. And for the price, it's better than what you'll get at many stores. Highly recommend!
It came as expected. Fit was nice and shirt was soft
More krinkly fabric even after ironing than I expected,  but ok. True to size

I absolutely love this shirt. It's comfortable, breaths well, the material nice, and it's true to size. The lack of a top button was good as it made the fold look pressed. The front pocket is a nice addition, I really like having a chest pocket on my shirts. The shirt was packaged well, folded, and had tissue sheet inside to protect it. The buttons are well made and well concealed. The feel is a little odd but still comfortable. Overall a great casual summer button down shirt that looks great on and at a great price.

A good quality shirt that feels light and soft against the skin. This is the perfect shirt to wear on your summer vacations. I however think it runs a little large so I would have preferred the next size down. It is meant to feel comfortable and causal, and it does, but I like my shirts to look sleeker on me.

My son liked it so well he kept it on after the pic and wore it when he left for errands  (it could have used a little ironing or some wrinkle release:).  He's not generally a fan of button downs but is learning to like them.  He was wearing a tee under the shirt for the pic and found the shirt comfortable, but when he removed the tee the shirt was even more comfortable (good to know he can wear it with a tee if needed). The fit is good and we ordered a L.  The fabric has a nice subtle texture.  He is 6'1"/190lbs and generally wears a M or L.
Good quality!!! Lightweight that will be perfect for summer! My husband is excited to wear it!

It is true to color and size and is very comfortable. Hubby is very happy with it. Nice stitching quality and buttons are firm and is altogether a very nice value. Will be ordering more in a few different colors for him.

I tend to get a lot of Hawaiian style shirts for the warmer months but I also like to get some darker and/or solid colors for a dressier look in the warm months.  This shirt fits the bill perfectly.  The shirt is made of a linen material and is very breathable and lightweight.  The blue color is really nice and the shirt fits perfectly.  The shirt is well made and durable and will go well with shorts or dressier slacks.  Recommend.

This shirt is really great. It's not all smooth and silky, but has a silky feeling to it. It also has a different look to it. The fit is spot on to. It'll be a great Linen shirt to go with my linen shorts I ordered as well. Cool, comfortable and looks great on. I did get the tan color, which I wouldn't normally get, but it's a soft tan color and with the summer tan coming up, it make just make me look MORE tan. Either way, I'm super happy with it and would recommend and purchase again.
I like the color the most. The shirt fits nicely. The fabric is light and cool and the sewing looks good. Comes with an extra button.

评论概述: Good quality shirt for the summer.
评论详情: COOFANDY Men’s Casual Short Sleeve Button Down  Pros: fabric feels good, threading and seams are good, and the overall proportion of the shirt fits true to size.  The only negative with white shirts are is the visibility of wearing an undershirt because you can see where lines end. (see pic for example). This is no short coming of this Coofandy shirt, it’s just the nature of white shirts in general.  Size reference: A size medium fits me great. 5’7, 175lbs, Athletic build.  I also didn’t steam the shirt for the purpose of showing it straight from the vacuumed sealed package.  Overall, this is good looking casual shirt that will compliment my summer wardrobe. I recommend.

评论概述: Love this shirt.  Great fit, nice feel.
评论详情: This shirt fits great, and feels great.  I wander between L and XL sizing in shirts, but with this one I went with the L.  That size fits great on me; the tell-tale for me is whether the front of the shirt gaps around the buttons -- this one has none of that.  With the material being polyester it has some give to it, and goes nicely through the washer and dryer without a bunch of wrinkles.  It's dressy enough to not look sloppy, but casual enough to wear with jeans -- works nicely either way.  Great shirt.
I really wanted to love this shirt, as it looks great in the photos, but after putting it on, it fit at least one size too large and was very baggy around the waist.

评论概述: Gorgeous look, Size fits as expected
评论详情: I ordered three shirts from different brands to test them out and this is by far the best looking. I'm a medium-sized male and the fit was perfect. Lightweight and breathable and looks good!  The navy isn't as dark in person as pictured but I think it looks great.

I am 5'8" and weigh 270 lbs.  A 3XL fit pretty well, but still pulled a little in the belly so definitely get your normal size or even go up a size.The material seems good, and the cut and sewing are excellent.  No stray threads or ugly seams.  It is really a nice shirt to wear.

I've ordered clothing from this company before and no issues. This shirt is really nice! I'm a medium and this runs a little larger than I would like, but not too big. I may have been able to get away with a small for this particular shirt. Stitching and quality are on point. Even though it's a little bigger on me than I'd like I really do like this shirt.
I love the feel of this material. It feels smooth almost silky and soft. It fits my husband nicely and I ordered his normal size. This will be great for a summer get together.
I like this shirt.  It's a little on the larger side, but still looks nice.  Doesn't seem like it would need to be ironed after a wash either.

I suppose you could wear this for more formal doings, but the shirt strikes me as best, with maybe shorts of jeans, putzing around the house. It's a nice, comfortable fabric, well put together, and a good value.
Good quality shirt made of soft, nice material. It feels like soft cotton on your skin, although it’s 100% polyester. The craft is good quality, and the color is great for summer.

This shirt is just the right amount of dressy casual. The fabric is so soft and light weight it is going to be so comfortable to wear in the summer. I got the large and it fits perfectly, just the right amount of looseness to help hide my belly. I am really looking forward to wearing this shirt on hot summer days.
